name: get_by_trakt_tv_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool mdblist.
Tool description: Get Movies and TV Shows data with ratings from multiple providers in JSON format
API description: Fetches movie or TV show information from the RapidAPI MDB List service based on a given Trakt.tv ID.

t.description: A valid Trakt.tv ID representing the movie or TV show.

m.description: The media type, either 'movie' or 'show'. Defaults to 'movie' if not specified.
